remarks: Closure law for the zero vector of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvzcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvzcl.6 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nvzcl $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z e. X ) $.
